description: This is a service worker script for handling push notifications in a web application. It manages installation, activation, push events, and notification clicks, facilitating basic push notification functionality.

methods.name: install event listener
methods.description: Handles the service worker installation, immediately activates the worker by calling skipWaiting.

methods.name: activate event listener
methods.description: Handles activation, claiming control of clients immediately.

methods.name: push event listener
methods.description: Receives push messages, parses data, and displays notifications with fallback if data is not in JSON format.

methods.name: notificationclick event listener
methods.description: Handles user clicking on the notification, focuses existing client or opens a new window.
